itemLabel: Arthur Moyses William Hill, 2nd Baron Sandys

wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant-General Arthur Moyses William Hill, 2nd Baron Sandys (10 January 1792 – 16 July 1860), styled as Lord Arthur Hill until 1836, was an Anglo-Irish soldier and politician.
